name: AttachedMediaView
description: A component for displaying file or media attachments. Supports two modes: File card (216x56dp with icon/thumbnail preview) and Media thumbnail (80x80dp). File cards show 4 file types (File, Audio, Image, Video) with appropriate icons or image previews. Both modes support normal and error states, a close button, and brand-aware theming via AttachedMediaColorScheme.

properties.name: attachedMediaType
properties.description: Display mode: FILE (card with icon/thumbnail) or MEDIA (square thumbnail)

properties.name: attachedFileType
properties.description: File type: FILE, AUDIO, IMAGE, or VIDEO. Controls preview icon/thumbnail

properties.name: attachedFileName
properties.description: File name displayed in the card

properties.name: attachedFileSize
properties.description: File size text shown below the file name

properties.name: attachedErrorText
properties.description: Error description shown in error state

properties.name: attachedIsError
properties.description: Whether to display in error state

properties.name: attachedMediaDuration
properties.description: Duration text shown in the media badge

properties.name: attachedShowBadge
properties.description: Whether to show the duration badge in media mode

properties.name: onClose
properties.description: Callback fired when the close button is tapped

xmlUsage:
<com.example.components.attachedmedia.AttachedMediaView
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    app:attachedMediaType="file"
    app:attachedFileType="audio"
    app:attachedFileName="recording.mp3"
    app:attachedFileSize="2.4 MB"
    app:attachedIsError="false"/>
kotlinUsage:
val media = AttachedMediaView(context)
media.configure(
    type = AttachedMediaView.MediaType.FILE,
    fileType = AttachedMediaView.FileType.AUDIO,
    fileName = "recording.mp3",
    fileSize = "2.4 MB",
    errorText = "Upload error",
    isError = false,
    thumbnailImage = null,
    mediaDuration = "1:23",
    showBadge = false,
    colorScheme = brand.attachedMediaColorScheme(isDark)
)
media.onClose = { /* handle close */ }
